function.description: Calculate area and volume of common geometric shapes given their dimensions and shape type.
function.name: calculate_area_and_volume_of_shapes

dimensions.description: The dimensions of the shape that are necessary to calculate its area and volume.

function.description: Calculate the area of a right triangle given the lengths of the two legs.
function.name: calculate_area_of_right_triangle

function.description: Calculate the volume of a cylinder given its radius and height.
function.name: calculate_cylinder_volume

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cylinder.

function.description: Calculate the volume of a sphere given its radius.
function.name: calculate_sphere_volume

function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its three sides using Heron's formula.
function.name: calculate_area_of_triangle_from_sides

function.description: Calculate the surface area of a cylinder given its radius and height.
function.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cylinder

radius.description: The radius of the cylinder base.

function.description: Calculate the surface area of a frustum given the radii and height.
function.name: calculate_surface_area_frustum

radius1.description: The radius of the upper base of the frustum.

radius2.description: The radius of the lower base of the frustum.

function.description: Calculate the ratio of two numbers.
function.name: calculate_ratio

function.description: Calculate the area of a circle given its radius.
function.name: calculate_circle_area

function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
function.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

function.description: Calculates the area of a circle given its radius.
function.name: calculate_area_of_circle

function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
function.name: calculate_triangle_area

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

function.description: Calculate the distance between two points in 3D space given their coordinates.
function.name: calculate_distance_between_points

point1.description: Coordinates of point 1, structured as {x: value, y: value, z: value}.

point2.description: Coordinates of point 2, structured as {x: value, y: value, z: value}.

function.description: Find relatively prime pairs (m, n) from an integer k represented as k = m/n.
function.name: find_prime_pairs

k.description: The integer representing the ratio m/n.

function.description: Calculate the surface area of a cube given its edge length.
function.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cube

edge_length.description: The length of one edge of the cube.

function.description: Calculate the volume of a cone given its base radius and height.
function.name: calculate_volume_of_cone

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cone.

function.description: Calculate the surface area of a cone given its base radius and height.
function.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cone

radius.description: The radius of the cone's base.

function.description: Calculate the area of a frustum given the areas of the top and bottom bases and the height.
function.name: calculate_area_of_frustum

function.description: Calculate the ratios of areas and volumes given the dimensions of the original solid and the ratios.
function.name: calculate_ratios_of_areas_volumes

original_area.description: The area of the original solid.

original_volume.description: The volume of the original solid.

function.description: Calculate the volume and surface area of a cone given the radius and height.
function.name: calculate_cone_volume_and_surface_area

function.description: Calculate the surface area of a cube given the edge length.
function.name: calculate_area_of_cube

edge_length.description: Length of one edge of the cube.
